title: Firehose FLIFO
description: Definition for firehose static flight information

ident.description: Callsign identifying the flight. Typically, ICAO airline code plus IATA/ticketing flight number, or the aircraft registration

atcident.description: Identifier used for ATC, if it differs from flight identifier

reg.description: The tail number or registration of the aircraft, if known and it differs from the ident

aircrafttype.description: FAA or ICAO aircraft type code

orig.description: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair

dest.description: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair. May be missing if not known

status.description: Single letter code for current flight status, can be S Scheduled, F Filed, A Active, Z Completed, or X Cancelled

scheduled_off.description: The scheduled out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format)

scheduled_on.description: The scheduled in (gate arrival) time (POSIX epoch format)

estimated_off.description: The estimated out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format)

estimated_on.description: The estimated in (gate arrival) time (POSIX epoch format)

actual_on.description: The actual in (gate arrival) time (POSIX epoch format)

actual_off.description: The actual out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format)
